newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Man dies in car blast in Bratislava.
newsitem.headline: Man dies in car blast in Bratislava.

text.p: A man was killed in a car explosion in a densely populated Bratislava suburb early on Thursday, a Slovak interior ministry spokeswoman said.
Spokeswoman Barbara Kuchurova told Slovak radio she could not confirm a report by the official TASR news agency that a second person had been seriously injured by the blast.
The explosion, in a car park, seriously damaged other nearby cars and windows up to the 12th floor of surrounding high rise apartment blocks were shattered.
No further details were immediately available.

In February, a woman was killed by a bomb in her car in Bratislava. Two explosions in January and February destroyed a Ferrari sports car in Kosice, eastern Slovakia, and a Mercedes in Zvolen, central Slovakia, but caused no injuries.
